title: 128. Comparing Connections in the Ethosphere with Ambrose Gillick (Part I)
itunes:title: 128. Comparing Connections in the Ethosphere with Ambrose Gillick (Part I)
description: Kicking off our new season of ArchitectureTalk, we engage in a conversation with Ambrose Gillick. Gillick shares his interest and findings in participatory and community-led architecture through a collaborative project with self-organising women's- co-op in Dakar, Senegal, and  theory of sacred space in medieval church architecture.
